DESCRIPTION: Summon a #yDoppel and put it into the first slot. If you have no empty slots, your first #yDoppel is automatically #yEvoked to make room.

When #ySummoned, choose a card to remove from combat. Passive effect of the #yDoppel is the weakened version of the card. NL When #yEvoked, return the removed card to your hand and it costs 0 this turn.
